thread.title: TV | Back to the Future Trilogy
thread.title_full: TV | Back to the Future Trilogy - entertainment.ie

author: Fiona Flynn
title: TV | Back to the Future Trilogy
text: As Wednesday was officially Back To The Future Day, ITV2 is showing all three of the movies from the hit franchise today. Perfect entertainment if you're feeling a little ropey after a Saturday night, or just great entertainment regardless. The fun kicks off at 2.05pm with the first (and, in our opinion, the best) of the bunch, followed by Back To The Future II at 4.25pm and, at 6.35pm, Back To The Future III. Bonus points if you can name the band that had a cameo in Back To The Future III.
